title: Vaccines in your salad? Scientists growing medicine-filled plants to replace injections, page 1
cleaned_text:
Well nothing could go wrong here at all. A bit ridiculous as not everyone needs medication nor the same amount. Some people eat more than others, some have never ate a salad in their life. 

 

 Considering how often you see a child in trouble or an adult after finding a candy gummy bear and eating it not realizing it’s infused with marijuana, how can they see this as a good idea ? 







originally posted by: incoserv 

 Well, that sucks! 

 

 I wonder if they'd require a warning lable. Given the climate now, I doubt it. 

 

 Hells to the no! This would just be another way to get what they want into your body without you knowing it. The criminality is bold faced (is it bold faced or bald faced...I always mix that up). None-the-less, so much for soup and salad buffets (not that I'd be able to get in without my passport anyway). Hells to the no! This would just be another way to get what they want into your body without you knowing it. The criminality is bold faced (is it bold faced or bald faced...I always mix that up). None-the-less, so much for soup and salad buffets (not that I'd be able to get in without my passport anyway). 





Wow medicine today is on crusade,EVERYONE will be saved whether you like it or not,things like this comes back and bites you.few years ago people were concerned about gmo,omg today people are gmo. 

 Is there a way to sign out from all this and live and die like human...im still gonna pay health insurance? 





I like veggies, I don't want to have to give up buying them from the store. I don't mind having protection against viruses that a chicken has had from antigen chemistry in eggs. As long as the eggs are not store bought ones where they kill any layer that sneezes, you will get some protection from their eggs. 







 

 Amazing how they are already treating mRNA as a done deal. Countries that have the highest mRNA vax rate have the highest cases. 

 

 to grow edible plants that carry the same medication as an mRNA vaccine 

 

 Who were did this they are idiotic. a reply to: TheMirrorSelf Amazing how they are already treating mRNA as a done deal. Countries that have the highest mRNA vax rate have the highest cases.Who were did this they are idiotic.
